definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: arrange or set in order (NH id.; also roll dough, Targum [[עֲרַךְ]] id.; Ph. [[ערכת]] CIS: No. 132:4 valuation, Bloch, but dub.; Ar. 9araka III. contend in battle, ma9rakun, ma9rakah;un battleground);—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: arrange in order, seven altars Nu 23:4, i.e. I have built seven altars in a row (cf. [[בנה]] v:Nu 23:1), flax-stalks Jos 2:6 (both JE); esp.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: set or lay in order, as wood Ge 22:9 (E), 1Ki 18:33, cf. Tophet Is 30:33, Le 1:7; offerings Le 1:8, Le 1:12, Le 6:5; lamp(s) Ex 27:21, Le 24:3, Le 24:4 (all P), lamp (fig. of dynasty) Ps 132:17; ‘shew’–bread Ex 40:4, Ex 40:23 (upon [[[עַל]]] sacred [[שֻׁלְחָן]] both c. acc. cogn.), Le 24:8 (P).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: in common life (cf. RS: Sem i. 189 f., 2nd ed. 200 f.), arrange a table (i.e. dishes in order upon it), [[שֻׁלְחָן]] Is 21:5, Pr 9:2 (fig. of wisdom), Ez Eze 23:41 (of Jerus. in fig.); Ps 23:5, Ps 78:19 (fig.; subj. God); in idolatr. worship Is 65:11.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: arrange a battle, i.e. draw up in battle order, [[מִלְחָמָה]] Ju Jdg 20:22, 1Sa 17:8, 2Sa 10:8 = 1Ch 19:9, 1Ch 12:37 (van d. H. v:36), 2Ch 14:9, [[עׂרְכֵי מִלְחָמָה]] 1Ch 12:34, 1Ch 12:36 (van d. H. v:33, v:35); ´[[עֱרוּךְ מ]] Joe 2:5; + [[אֵת]] with, i.e. against Ju Jdg 20:20, Ge 14:8, [[עִם]] 2Ch 13:8; + [[לִקְרַאת]] 1Sa 17:2, 1Ch 19:17 b; [[מַעֲרָכָה לִקְרַאת]] ´[[ע]] 1Sa 17:21; [[לַמִּלְחָמָה עָרוּךְ כְּאִישׁ]] Je 6:23, Je 50:42; obj. om. Ju Jdg 20:22, Jdg 20:23, + [[לִקְרַאת]] 1Sa 4:2, 2Sa 10:9, 2Sa 10:10 = 1Ch 19:10, 1Ch 19:11, 2Sa 10:17; + [[אֶל]] against Ju Jdg 20:30, Je 50:14, 1Ch 19:17 a, [[לְ]] against Je 50:9; —Job 6:4 read [[יַעַכְרוּנִי]] Di Bu Du.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: arrange weapons of army in order for battle Je 46:3, 1Ch 12:9 (van d. H. v:8).

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: arrange words ([[מִלִּין]]) Job 32:14 ([[אֶל ê ]] against), so (obj. om.) Job 33:5 ([[לְפָנַי ê ]]), Job 37:19, Ps 5:4 (prob.; > of arranging a sacrifice); cf. recount things in order, [[יַעְרְכֶהָ לִי]] Is 44:7.

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: state in order, set forth a legal case Job 13:18, Job 23:4, so prob. (obj. om.) of God Ps 50:21 ([[לְעֵינֶי ְê ]]), and (pass. of [[בְּרִית]]) 2Sa 23:5 (cf. Dr).—[[הֲיַעֲרׂךְ שׁועך]] Job 36:19 is difficult: Di will he set thy cry ([[שַׁוְעְֲ]]) in order? Bi (for [[לאׁ]]) [[לוֹ]] ´[[הֲיֵעָרֵךְ שׁ]] shall thy cry be set in order unto him? (sense good, although

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: not found); v. al. in Di.

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: compare (as result of arranging in order): [[־לוֹ]]´[[מַה־דְּמוּת תַּע]] Is 40:18 what likeness will ye compare to him? [[אֵין עֲרׂךְ אֵלֶיְ]] Ps 40:6.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: intrans. be comparable, c. [[לְ]], Ps 89:7 (‖[[דָּמָה]]), c. sf. of thing compared Job 28:17, Job 28:19.
